Test typed prompt to visual/text/voice event completion
Test artifact save then lexical and semantic recall from UI

scope_out: Cross-browser matrix expansion beyond baseline Chromium
Long-haul soak tests over multi-hour sessions

Create fixture data and reproducible audio test inputs
Write end-to-end tests for typed and voice turns
Write artifact lifecycle E2E tests including recall
Wire E2E command into CI workflow required checks

At least one test validates artifact save and semantic recall from UI
